short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Trader's assistant. Shows to whom you have already sent messages about purchases.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Trader's assistant. Shows to whom you have already sent messages about purchases.

After we send a message and trade the seller's nickname will turn green. 
If the message was sent more than 5 minutes ago, it will be blue. 
If it was sent more than 10 minutes ago, it will be red.
